title: Happy Birthday, Kasumi-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Oh cute and adorable Kasumi-chan, Maru is here to pick you up zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Good work! Today is princess Kasumin’s birthday, after all! So everyone gathered for me, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Uhh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>....or so Kasumin saw in a dream! Hey, hey, Maruko! That’s not true, right? Everyone will be there, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Of course zura. Kanata-san and Kotori-san were really excited about making the cake. Kanan-chan and Mari-chan also ran around searching for the best seafood so we all can have a good feast, you know? But despite that.... Maru is sorry that you had a nightmare on your birthday. It must’ve been scary, huh, Kasumi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Waaaah, Kasumin was really worried~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>There, there, it’s okay. But you know, it’s 4 AM right now. Maru was up helping the temple, but you shouldn’t call the other girls at this hour, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah.... S-, sorry, Kasumin didn’t look at the time.... Kasumin is really sorry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Fufu. But Maru is happy to be the first one to wish you a happy birthday zura. Happy birthday, Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
